channel.title: spark on Fatkun's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in spark on Fatkun's Blog

item.title: cdh4 spark配置LZO
item.description: 使用的hadoop是cdh4.2.1版本 spark1.1，需要配置hadoop-native和lzo native 在spark-env.sh加入 HADOOP_CONF_DIR=/etc/hadoop/conf SPARK_SUBMIT_CLASSPATH=$SPARK_SUBMIT_CLASSPATH:/etc/hive/conf:/opt/cloudera/parcels/HADOOP_LZO/lib/hadoop/lib/hadoop-lzo.jar #SPARK_SUBMIT_LIBRARY_PATH=$SPARK_SUBMIT_LIBRARY_PATH:/opt/cloudera/parcels/CDH/lib/hadoop/lib/native:/opt/cloudera/parcels/HADOOP_LZO/lib/hadoop/lib/native LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/opt/cloudera/parcels/CDH/lib/hadoop/lib/native:/opt/cloudera/parcels/HADOOP_LZO/lib/hadoop/lib/native
